name: Lovely Dye
flavorText: Named for the beauty of Queen Asylla, who once had a thousand gowns created in this beautiful pink color as a gift from King Leoric.
flavorTextHtml: Named for the beauty of Queen Asylla, who once had a thousand gowns created in this beautiful pink color as a gift from King Leoric.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
